    1. CPU(String, Colour, BoardManager)

Class CPU

java.lang.Object
model.player.Player
model.player.CPU
public class CPU extends Player
The CPU class represents a computer-controlled player in the game. Extends the Player class and utilizes the BoardManager for in-game decisions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CPU(String name, Colour colour, BoardManager boardManager)
    Constructs a CPU player with a given name, colour, and board manager.

  • Constructor Details

    • CPU

      public CPU(String name, Colour colour, BoardManager boardManager)
      Constructs a CPU player with a given name, colour, and board manager.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the CPU player.
      colour - The colour associated with this CPU player.
      boardManager - The board manager for accessing board-related actions.
